titles.title: POST Act
POST Act
Protect Our Services Today Act of 2022
A bill to prohibit the closure of postal facilities during the COVID-19 public health emergency.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
Protect Our Services Today Act of 2022 or the POST Act
This bill prohibits the U.S. Postal Service (USPS) from closing any USPS facility during the COVID-19 public health emergency period.
